headline: Bank Earnings in Focus as Q3 Earnings Season Takes Center Stage
summary: There is justifiable optimism about the big banks' business prospects. Loan demand is expected to accelerate, the peak in delinquencies is now behind us, deal pipelines are seen as steadily getting stronger, and trading activities remain robust.

headline: Eric Trump reportedly opens Citi account, deposits some of father’s trust money
summary: Investing.com -- Eric Trump, son of U.S. President Donald Trump, has established a trust at Citigroup that holds some of his father’s money, according to a Bloomberg News report published Thursday.
